# TweenMode.hold

**Case**

An option that indicates a keyframe changes to the next abruptly.

## Declaration

```swift
case hold
```

## Choosing a mode between frames

- **TweenMode.linear**: An option that indicates that a keyframe changes to the next gradually.

items.description: An option that indicates that a keyframe changes to the next gradually.
items.name: TweenMode.linear
